definitions.text: (Yiddish) a big shot who knows it and acts that way; a boastful immoderate person
a person who knocks (as seeking to gain admittance)
examples: open the door and see who the knocker is

definitions.text: one who disparages or belittles the worth of something
either of two soft fleshy milk-secreting glandular organs on the chest of a woman
a device (usually metal and ornamental) attached by a hinge to a door
